author: jberry
msg: Tighten curl selection to ensure that both easy.h and multi.h are present

author: vmassol
msg: MNG-2587: [maven-invoker-plugin] build.log file should not be placed inside the target/ directory

The build.log file is now created in the project's top level dir (next to pom.xml). Another solution would be to create those build.log files in the calling project's target dir and name them with some unique name pointing to the project they're logging...

author: hindessm
msg: Applied patch from "[#HARMONY-1594] [DRLVM] fixed compilation errors
(gcc 4.*) in jitrino".  Tested with gcc version 3.0, 3.2, 3.4, 4.0 and
4.1.  Failed with binutils bug (as before) with gcc 3.3.

msg: Fixed up the windows Release build for the Calculator sample to match how the Debug build operates

msg: use table to layout label for separator to have more control over styling; CSS styling for field sets is rather limited
